videos.title: Hungry Bear 100 mile Gravel bike racing in Cable Wisconsin. Bike, Salsa Cutthroat
videos.description: Hungry bear 100 gravel bike race starts and ends in Cable Wi. There's also a shorter 60 mile race. The Salsa Cutthroat on 2.2 Teravails came in handy at mile 80 when the roads turned into rocky Sand for nearly 8 miles.
